infomations.name: Tomatoes
infomations.description: Red, juicy fruits commonly used in salads and sauces

infomations.name: Carrots
infomations.description: Orange root vegetables often used in stews and soups

infomations.name: Cucumbers
infomations.description: Green, cylindrical fruits often used in salads and pickles

infomations.name: Lettuce
infomations.description: Leafy green vegetable often used in salads

infomations.name: Peppers
infomations.description: Sweet or spicy fruits often used in cooking

infomations.name: Broccoli
infomations.description: Green vegetable with tightly packed clusters of buds

infomations.name: Green beans
infomations.description: Long, slender green vegetables often used in stews and casseroles

infomations.name: Spinach
infomations.description: Dark green leafy vegetable often used in salads and quiches

infomations.name: Apples
infomations.description: Apples are a temperate fruit crop that grow best in areas with cool winters and moderate summers. They require well-drained soils with moderate fertility and a pH of around 6.0-7.0. Apple trees require pruning and thinning to maximize fruit quality and yield.

infomations.name: Oranges
infomations.description: Oranges are a subtropical to tropical fruit crop that grow best in areas with warm temperatures and high humidity. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 6.0-7.5. Orange trees require regular irrigation and fertilization to produce high-quality fruit.

infomations.name: Grapes
infomations.description: Grapes are a temperate to subtropical fruit crop that grow best in areas with warm summers and moderate winters. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 6.0-6.5. Grapevines require trellising and pruning to maximize fruit production and quality.

infomations.name: Bananas
infomations.description: Bananas are a tropical fruit crop that grow best in areas with warm temperatures and high humidity. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 5.5-6.5. Banana plants require regular irrigation and fertilization to produce high-quality fruit.

infomations.name: Avocado
infomations.description: Avocados are a subtropical to tropical fruit crop that grow best in areas with warm temperatures and high humidity. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 5.5-7.0. Avocado trees require regular irrigation and fertilization to produce high-quality fruit.
infomations.season: Typically harvested in the winter and early spring
infomations.quantityofwater: Regular irrigation is required, especially during dry periods
infomations.timeharvest: Generally takes 7-15 years for a newly planted avocado tree to produce fruit

infomations.name: Peaches
infomations.description: Peaches are a temperate fruit crop that grow best in areas with cool winters and moderate summers. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 6.0-7.0. Peach trees require pruning and thinning to maximize fruit quality and yield.

infomations.name: Wheat
infomations.description: Wheat is a staple crop that requires well-drained soil with high organic matter content. It grows best in cooler climates with temperatures between 15-20째C. The crop needs around 60 cm of rainfall during the growing season. Wheat is typically planted in the fall and harvested in the summer.
infomations.quantityofwater: Around 60 cm of rainfall during the growing season

infomations.name: Rice
infomations.description: Rice is a crop that requires high amounts of water and grows best in warm, tropical climates with temperatures between 20-35째C. It requires flooded or puddled soil for transplanting and is typically planted in the spring and harvested in the fall.

infomations.name: Corn
infomations.description: Corn is a warm-season crop that requires well-drained soil with moderate to high fertility. It grows best in temperatures between 21-29째C and requires around 75 cm of rainfall during the growing season. Corn is typically planted in the spring and harvested in the fall.
infomations.quantityofwater: Around 75 cm of rainfall during the growing season

infomations.name: Barley
infomations.description: Barley is a cool-season crop that grows best in temperate climates with temperatures between 10-25째C. It requires well-drained soil with good fertility and around 50 cm of rainfall during the growing season. Barley is typically planted in the fall and harvested in the summer.
infomations.quantityofwater: Around 50 cm of rainfall during the growing season

infomations.name: Mangoes
infomations.description: Mangoes are a tropical to subtropical fruit crop that grow best in areas with warm temperatures and high humidity. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 5.5-7.5. Mango trees require regular irrigation and fertilization to produce high-quality fruit.

infomations.name: Blueberries
infomations.description: Blueberries are a temperate fruit crop that grow best in areas with cool summers and moderate winters. They require well-drained soils with good fertility and a pH of around 4.5-5.5. Blueberry bushes require regular irrigation and fertilization to produce high-quality fruit.
